name: TEMPLE (Raymond Dee, LimitCut)
description:
TEMPLE is a text-based adventure puzzle game in which players wits are put to the test. Try to escape with the treasure and your life!

Any time you're prompted for input outside of combat, a list of commands can be seen by typing "help".

In the more tricky situations, the key commands will be highlighted, but make sure you don't make a slip, it may be the last mistake you ever make.
